name: Gear Rescuer
description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Phortion.GearRescuer_Reload

Puzzle game of gears. Rescue chicks from cruel destiny.

Move one gear to a motor then it will start to rotate. Connect another gear to rotate it too. Lastly, put a gear to move a conveyor.

Connect gears carefully so the chicks can safely pass through press machines. Don't let them become rich and delicious roast chickens.

Select and connect the appropriate gears to avoid presses, moving in different cycles.

You can know the sizes of the gears and the cycles of the press machines by those color.

All connected gears have the same linear velocity. Thus, gears with different radii have different angular speeds that are inversely proportional to the radius.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Phortion.GearRescuer_Reload
